mapper.insert: insert into volunteer_apply (volunteer_apply_id, volunteer_task_id, create_time, apply_user_id, remark) values (#{volunteerApplyId}, #{volunteerTaskId}, #{createTime}, #{applyUserId}, #{remark})
mapper.select: select volunteer_apply.ids, volunteer_apply_id, volunteer_task.volunteer_task_id, title, volunteer_apply.create_time, apply_user_id, apply_user.name as apply_user_name, remark, read_time, process_result, process_time, process_remark, process_user_id, process_user.name as process_user_name, process_read_time, title, create_user_id as task_create_user_id, task_create_user.name as task_create_user_name from volunteer_apply left join volunteer_task on volunteer_apply.volunteer_task_id=volunteer_task.volunteer_task_id left join user_info apply_user on apply_user_id=user_id left join user_info process_user on process_user_id=process_user.user_id left join user_info task_create_user on create_user_id=task_create_user.user_id where volunteer_apply_id=#{volunteerApplyId}
